question: Which union territory falls under jurisdiction of Calcutta High Court?
explanation: Justice Debasish Kar Gupta has recently been sworn-in as the new chief justice of the Calcutta High Court. It is the oldest High Court in India and has jurisdiction over the state of West Bengal and the Union Territory of the Andaman and Nicobar Islands. The seat of the High Court is Kolkata, capital of West Bengal. The High Court building\'s design is based on the Cloth Hall, Ypres, in Belgium.
